Html:
Hello,

Is there any software that would test the rules directly on clients before adding them to the wsuspp packages ?

Tks,

I would like to find a way for WPP to be able to test such rules directly against client computer. Unfortunately, I didn't found this way.
If you have a tip, tell me.

perhaps not directly wsp , but a minitest software.

with wpp, you can act on client remotly. launch detect & report
